original_text: All the officers did come to Jeremiah to ask him about his meeting with the king. Jeremiah said to them everything that the king had told him to say. Nobody had heard what Jeremiah and the king had really talked about. So the officers stopped asking Jeremiah any more questions.
korean_text: 모든 고관이 예레미야에게 와서 물으매 그가 왕이 명령한 모든 말대로 대답하였으므로 일이 탄로되지 아니하였고 그들은 그와 더불어 말하기를 그쳤더라

sentences.original_text: All the officers did come to Jeremiah
to ask him about his meeting with the king
sentences.korean_translation: 왕과의 만남에 대해 그에게 묻기 위해

sentences.original_text: that the king had told him to say
Nobody had heard what Jeremiah and the king had really talked about
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 예레미야와 왕이 실제로 나눈 대화를 듣지 못했습니다

sentences.original_text: So the officers stopped asking Jeremiah any more questions
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 관원들은 예레미야에게 더 이상 질문하는 것을 멈췄습니다
